name: Computer Generated Solutions (CGS)
tagline: Directly aligned with to customers' needs
description: Founded in New York City in 1984, CGS currently serves North America, Europe, Asia and Latin America with 20 global locations, and over 4,000 employees worldwide. CGS enables mid-market enterprises, Fortune 1000 companies, and government agencies to drive business transformation and improve operating performance by adapting and implementing advanced technologies—carried out by proven, cross-industry, multi-platform experts that are dedicated to customer satisfaction.
